channel.title: career on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in career on Reflections

item.title: A new beginning
item.description: A few months ago, I stood at the crossroads of my career thinking about my next chapter. I loved my job, my team, and was at the peak of my career as a leader. Yet, I yearned for a return to the world of hands-on development, where I could immerse myself in the flow of code. The more I thought about it, the more I was convinced that I want to pivot my career towards the goal of coding, learning and building with tech.
